name: post-deleteLegalArrangements
description: Deletes legal arrangements and/or legal arrangement entities associated with an account holder.

accountHolderCode.description: The code of the account holder.

legalArrangementCode.description: The code of the legal arrangement to be deleted. If you also send `legalArrangementEntityCodes`, only the entities listed will be deleted.

legalArrangementEntityCodes.description: List of legal arrangement entities to be deleted.
